Job Posting:163610 - Position: S25 Security Engineer Intern 163610 E2 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/07/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/24/2025 09:44 AM Expired ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Coinbase 1 Front Street, STE 3100 San Francisco Province / State CA JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Summer S25 Security Engineer Intern 163610 E2 Co-op Position Multiple Locations USA 4 months US 50.0 per hour for 0 Major List Job Title: Security Engineer Intern Job ID: P62278 This is a 12-week internship during summer 2025. Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you're capable of? At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It's a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform - and with it, the future global financial system. To achieve our mission, we're seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company's hardest problems. Our work culture is intense and isn't for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there's no better place to be. The Security Data Platforms team builds and maintains systems that support Coinbase's security alerting, detection, and investigation functions, as well as proactive monitoring of security configurations. Your responsibilities will include building new data collection capabilities, automating maintenance tasks, and adding contextual data to better risk-inform our decisions. What you'll be doing (ie. job duties): • Working with our senior engineers building new data collection infrastructure or automation using Go or Python • Improving our security asset management applications Following our secure software development lifecycle • Pay Transparency Notice: Depending on your work location, the target annual salary for this position can range as detailed below. Full time offers from Coinbase also include target bonus + benefits (including medical, dental, vision and 401(k)). Job Requirements What we look for in you (ie. job requirements): • Strong software development skill set • Demonstrated interest in a career in Security Strong communication skills • Nice to haves: • Currently pursuing a degree or certificate in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Mathematics or a related area discipline • Experience working in Github and AWS • Proficiency in Python and Go Strong understanding of blockchain technology and risks • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.coinbase.com/en-ca/careers/positions/6306332 Indicate your interest to apply to this position in SCOPE and also submit your application package via the online website portal. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may expire at any time. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
